en: The burden of Moab. For in a night Ar of Moab is laid waste, and brought to nought; for in a night Kir of Moab is laid waste, and brought to nought.
hmr: Moab ram phurrik chu. Zân khat kârin Moab rama Ar khuo chu suksietin a um a, iengkhawm ni loa siemin a um ta sih a; zân khat kârin Moab rama Kir khuo chu suksietin a um a, iengkhawm ni loa siemin a um ta sih a.

en: They are gone up to Bayith, and to Dibon, to the high places, to weep: Moab waileth over Nebo, and over Medeba; on all their heads is baldness, every beard is cut off.
hmr: Dibon mipui chu bâwlhmuna hai chun ṭap dingin an hang fe a, Moab- hai chun Nebo le Medeba chu an ṭapkhum rak rak a, an lu po po a kawl vawng a, khâk hmul tinrêng khawm vawin a um ta vawng a nih.

en: In their streets they gird themselves with sackcloth; on their housetops, and in their broad places, every one waileth, weeping abundantly.
hmr: An kawtthlêrahai chun saiip puon an dierkei a, an in chungahai le an tuolzâwl lienna laiahai chun mi tin chu nasataka ṭapin an khêk rak rak a.

en: And Heshbon crieth out, and Elealeh; their voice is heard even unto Jahaz: therefore the armed men of Moab cry aloud; his soul trembleth within him.
hmr: Chun, Hesbonhai khawm chu an khêk a, Eleale mihai leh; an râwl chu Jahaz khuo chen khawma an lo hriet a; chuleiin, Moab mihai râlthuoma inthuomhai chu inringtakin an khêk a; an hringna chu an phîng sûnga chun ân thin a.

en: My heart crieth out for Moab; her nobles flee unto Zoar, to Eglath-shelishi-yah: for by the ascent of Luhith with weeping they go up; for in the way of Horonaim they raise up a cry of destruction.
hmr: Moabhai leiin ka lungril chu a khêk a; an mi ṭhahai chu Zoar khuoa le Eglath-selisijah-ah an tlân a, Luhith lam tunga chun ṭap pumin an fe a nih; Horonaim lampuia chun sietna khêkin an khêk suok a nih.

en: For the waters of Nimrim shall be desolate; for the grass is withered away, the tender grass faileth, there is no green thing.
hmr: Nimrim tuihai chu suksietin a um ding a ni sih a; hlobet chu a vuoi zo a, hlobet inder thar chu a rawp a, thil hring rêng rêng chu a um ta si nawh a.

en: Therefore the abundance they have gotten, and that which they have laid up, shall they carry away over the brook of the willows.
hmr: Chuleiin, an sum la nei sunhai le an sie ṭhathai chu Phahrâm Vadung râla chun fe hmangpui an tih.

en: For the cry is gone round about the borders of Moab; the wailing thereof unto Eglaim, and the wailing thereof unto Beer-elim.
hmr: Khêkri chu Moab ramri vêlahai chun a um sih a, khêk rak rak ri chu Eglaim khuo chenin ân hriet a nih; khêk rak rak ri chu Beerelim khuo chenin ân hriet a nih.

en: For the waters of Dimon are full of blood; for I will bring yet more upon Dimon, a lion upon them of Moab that escape, and upon the remnant of the land.
hmr: Dimon tuihai chu thisenin ân pawl zo vawng sih a; Dimon chunga chun thil nasa nâwk zuol kân tlungtir ding a ni sih a, Moabhai laia tlân- suokhai chunga le, chu rama la um sunhai chunga chun sakeibaknei intlungtir ka tih.
